issue.title: [Website] Add Use Cases section to the website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-974](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-974). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will contain a list of "canonical use cases" for Arrow:

- In-memory data structure for vectorized analytics / SIMD, or creating a column-oriented analytic database system

- Reading and writing columnar storage formats like Apache Parquet

- Faster alternative to Thrift, Protobuf, or Avro in RPC

- Shared memory IPC (zero-copy in-situ analytics)

Any other ideas?
